name: Heaven's Dice
description:
Game about being a dice in heaven.

Features
  • Good visuals
  • Addictive Gameplay Non existent gameplay
  • Fluid & Satisfying controls
  • No story
Jam Summary

Initially I planned to create combat system based around this dice, but I ran out of time. I started a bit late and the player controller script took me way too much time to get it working properly. This is the 4th Jam that I finished and for the 4th time I have aimed way too high. That's why this game has bare bones, barely working gameplay loop. In conclusion - scope small and focus on the main gameplay loop first.

Controls

Move - WSAD
Quit - ESC
